body:
### ![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/23-1.png)

__[Klik di sini untuk Bahasa Melayu](https://raiz.com.my/blog/raiz-rewards-fitcheck-bm/)__

__14/1/2022__

__*New Released Brands*__

*PatPat, XIXILI, Poney, Yoox, Al-Ikhsan Sports & Dr Mister*

Shopping for stylish items online is becoming easier these days, and we are undeniably spoilt for choice! Convenience is half the fun – the rest is the anticipation while waiting for your items to be delivered, and the joy after your item has arrived. It feels almost like receiving a gift (though from yourself), but it is just as joyful.

Now that most workplaces, colleges, and schools have re-opened, we think this is the best time for you to get an outfit change. We have selected a few brands for you to shop your clothes from!

Shop with our brand partners through Raiz Rewards and be on your way to receive a cash reward which will be invested back into your Raiz Investment Account.

So, as you shop, you invest! Be on your way to receive a cash reward just by clicking the Shop Online Here button through Raiz Rewards\*.

__\*Terms & Conditions apply.__

From women’s clothes, men’s clothes, to kids’ wear, we’ve got you covered. Check out our new brand partners below!

__YOOX__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/52.png)

__(+ 1.47%  invested)__

__Yoox__ is the world’s leading online store for fashion, offering an unparalleled collection of merchandise from the most prestigious designers.

Shop online now with __Yoox__ with Raiz Rewards and you will receive __1.47%__ from your purchase price and invested into your Raiz account.

__Dr Mister__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/54.png)

__(+4.9% invested)__

__Dr Mister__ is one of the best streetwear brands in Malaysia which aims to bring value and thoughts to your daily essentials.

Shop online now with __Dr Mister__ with Raiz Rewards and you will receive __4.9%__ from your purchase price and invested into your Raiz account.

__Al-Ikhsan__

__![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/53.png)  
__

__(+1.96% invested)__

__Al-Ikhsan Sports__ is Malaysia’s No. 1 sports retailer which is primarily involved in the retail of sports.

Shop online now with __Al-Ikhsan Sports__with Raiz Rewards and you will receive __1.96%__ from your purchase price and invested into your Raiz account.

__PatPat__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/51.png)

__(+6.86% invested)__

__PatPat__ offers a big range of newborn baby clothes, kids designer clothes, matching family outfits, home accessories, and more.

Shop online now with __PatPat__with Raiz Rewards and you will receive __6.86%__ from your purchase price and invested into your Raiz account.

__Poney__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/50.png)

__(+ 2.45% invested)__

__Poney__ is a leading retailer in Malaysia, specializing in a wide range of comfortable and fashionable products for kids.

Shop online now with __Poney__ with Raiz Rewards and you will receive __2.45%__ from your purchase price and invested into your Raiz account.

__XIXILI__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/900-x-506-For-blog-pixel-size-10.png)

__(+ 3.68% invested)__

__Xixili__ offers beautiful fashion lingerie that is supported with all the essential elements of fit and comfort for each individual’s needs.

Shop online now with __XIXILI__ with Raiz Rewards and you will receive __3.68%__from your purchase price and invested into your Raiz account.

Raiz Rewards
